channel.title: Ethics on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in Ethics on Joost Plattel

item.title: Symbiose Studio
item.description:
Working with Bertrand from Symbiose Studio I’ve build the technical side of Intimate Implant. Three objects, each representing an regenerative implant. Three stories that investigate ethics, sacrifice and our relation to technology that disappears. Learn more at Symbiose Studio.

Photo by Ivar Pel

Each object carries a microcontroller that is running micropython and a speaker that allows telling stories (or by headphones). The LEDs in combination with a accelerometer creates an object that invites persons to interact with the objects.

item.title: Ambassador for the Digital Society School Amsterdam
item.description: In 2018 - 2020 I am one of the ambassadors for the Digital Society School located in Amsterdam
